content:
ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport Class

In this Article

The ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport class represents an inter-site transport object.

Syntax

Declaration

public class ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport : IDisposable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Properties summary

BridgeAllSiteLinks

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all site links are bridged.
IgnoreReplicationSchedule

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the replication schedule is ignored.
SiteLinkBridges

Gets a ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection object that contains all site link bridges for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.
SiteLinks

Gets a ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection object that contains all site links for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.
TransportType

Gets an ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that represents the transport type for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

Methods summary

Dispose()

Releases all resources that are used by the object.
Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
FindByTransportType(DirectoryContext,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

Gets an ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object for a given directory context and transport type.
GetDirectoryEntry()

Gets the DirectoryEntry object for the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.
Save()

Commits all changes to the current ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object to the underlying directory store.
ToString()

Gets the string representation of the ActiveDirectoryTransportType of the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

Properties

  • BridgeAllSiteLinks

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all site links are bridged.

    public bool BridgeAllSiteLinks { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      A Boolean value that indicates whether to bridge all site links. true if all site links are bridged; otherwise, false.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

  • IgnoreReplicationSchedule

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the replication schedule is ignored.

    public bool IgnoreReplicationSchedule { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      A Boolean value that indicates whether to ignore the replication schedule. true if the replication schedule is ignored; otherwise, false.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

    Remarks

    When the IgnoreReplicationSchedule is true, any site link availability schedules that have been configured are ignored, and all site links become always-available for replication. When set to false, any previously configured site link availability schedules go back into effect. If no site link availability schedules have been configured, setting this property has no effect.

  • SiteLinkBridges

    Gets a ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection object that contains all site link bridges for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection SiteLinkBridges { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection

      A ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection object that contains ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge objects that represent site link bridges.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

  • SiteLinks

    Gets a ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection object that contains all site links for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection SiteLinks { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection

      A ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection object that contains ActiveDirectorySiteLink objects that represent site links.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

  • TransportType

    Gets an ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that represents the transport type for this ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType TransportType { get; }

    Property Value

    • ActiveDirectoryTransportType

      One of the ActiveDirectoryTransportType values that represents the transport type for this object.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

Methods

  • Dispose()

    Releases all resources that are used by the object.

    public void Dispose ();
  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

    protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

  • FindByTransportType(DirectoryContext,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

    Gets an ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object for a given directory context and transport type.

    public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport FindByTransportType (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport);

    Parameters

    • context
      DirectoryContext

      A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for the search.

    • transport
      ActiveDirectoryTransportType

      An ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that specifies a transport type to find in the search.

    Returns

    • ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport

      An ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object for the item found. An ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException exception is thrown if an object was not found.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

      The object was not found.

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ArgumentException

      The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

    • ArgumentNullException

      The context parameter is null.

    • AuthenticationException

      The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

    • InvalidEnumArgumentException

      The transport parameter is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

  • GetDirectoryEntry()

    Gets the DirectoryEntry object for the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry ();

    Returns

    • DirectoryEntry

      A DirectoryEntry object that represents the directory entry for the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

  • Save()

    Commits all changes to the current ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object to the underlying directory store.

    public void Save ();

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

      The target server is either busy or unavailable.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.

    • UnauthorizedAccessException

      The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

  • ToString()

    Gets the string representation of the ActiveDirectoryTransportType of the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      A String that represents the ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport type of the ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport object.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The current object has been disposed.
